titles: The Vergins advice to the maids of London to the tune of Oh! that I were but young for you.
publisher: Printed and sold by Charles Barnet,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd. ed)
Printed on right half of sheet which also contains Wing (2nd ed.)  R1793, "Roger the West-country lad".
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College Library, University of Cambridge.
